title: New: Ménage à Trois – Lonely This Christmas
body:
Mancunian crooners** Ménage à Trois** cover Mud’s 1974 single _Lonely This Christmas_, in their ever impressive, dreamy manner.

Less than ten days ’till Christmas Day, and I’ve finally come to terms with the fact that Xmas is well and truly here, thankfully, covers like this serve to make it somewhat bearable. It’s the only Christmas cover you’ll need this year. Check out Lonely This Christmas below.

It’s the only Christmas cover \[…\]
